ygData.subject: Re: some info
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool I just wanted to know for sure before I spent my money on it.  I don t have the 6000PP right now, because I have some stuff I want to buy first, but I
ygData.messageBody:
Cool I just wanted to know for sure before I spent my money on it. I
don't have the 6000PP right now, because I have some stuff I want to buy
first, but I will get it sometime soon. Thanks a lot.

"C. Watkins" wrote:

> A good friend of mine told me he heard from someone that you could
> tinker a weightless bag. I shrugged it off as probably being nothing
> to it. Since, I've heard of the bag here, I started to tell him about
> it when he told me he bought it already and it is a weightless item
> bag. He is a level 47 paladin. As far as tinkering it.. I still don't
> buy it.

--Eron
